name: Project Sakura
description:
Somewhere in the far future, breakthrough inventions have turned against humans...

Since scientists have created a neko-droid, the science moved forward and soon the world's first catgirl codenamed "Project Sakura" has been bred. But jealousy is a butch: neko-droids got angry and have captured the military base and the City during the uprising against the new invention. After some trainings, Sakura is sent to the City to put this destructive jealousy to an end.

Features:
-Cute anime-styled retro graphics
-Unique levels with different themes
-Lighthearted plot
-Ability to use vehicles
-Dogfights with giant mechas!
